title: Best SMS API in Ghana? Sendexa vs Hubtel vs Arkesel – Full 2025 Comparison
excerpt: Looking for the most reliable SMS API in Ghana? In this 2025 benchmark, we compare Sendexa to Hubtel and Arkesel across delivery speed, uptime, support, and pricing. See why Sendexa is trusted by Africa’s fastest-growing startups.

content.text: Choosing the right SMS gateway in Ghana or across Africa can make or break your communication strategy. In this post, we compare three major players — Sendexa, Hubtel, and Arkesel — in terms of reliability, latency, pricing, and developer experience.

African businesses depend on fast and dependable SMS delivery for OTPs, alerts, and customer communication. Delays or message failures can result in lost users or missed revenue. That’s why we put Sendexa to the test — alongside local competitors — using real message delivery benchmarks.
Speed Test Results: Local Infrastructure Wins
We conducted a 30-day test sending 10,000 messages each through Sendexa, Hubtel, and Arkesel. The results were clear:
Sendexa consistently outperformed both competitors in speed and reliability.

Sendexa is directly integrated with telecom providers like MTN, AirtelTigo, and Telecel. Unlike Twilio, which routes traffic internationally, Sendexa’s localized routes cut latency dramatically.
